Articles.Content:
I downloaded the demo of this game 2 days ago and have not been able to put it down since.

Consequently I have just purchased the full version.

It has been a very long time since I have seen a game that grabbed me as solidly as this one did so I would just like to say a big well done to the dev team.

Hi Larkspeed, welcome to the great big KSP community

It\'s hard to put down isn\'t it? I don\'t think I can put in words what makes KSP so great, maybe it\'s just the dream of space travel and exploration we all have, KSP is like a breath of fresh air in a stagnant games industry.

Not just that but this game has opened the eyes of many players including myself as to just how stuff moves in space, it\'s hands on and raw, and so much fun.

Good luck on all your flights Larkspeed

It is indeed very addicting. This is my usual process:

>play for months

>2 week pause

>repeat

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!
